titleStmt.title: Dauids soliloquie Containing many comforts for afflicted mindes. As they were deliuered in sundry sermons at Saint Maries in Douer. By Io: Reading.
titleStmt.author: Reading, John, 1588-1667.
Hulsius, Friedrich van, b. 1580, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by [John Legat] for Robert Allot, and are to be sold at his shop in Saint Pauls Church-yeard at the signe of the Greyhound,

notesStmt.note: With an additional title page, engraved, signed: F. Hulsius invenit et sculps·.
Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A¹² (+engr. title) B-V¹² X² .
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Saint Pauls Church-yeard at the signe of the Greyhound
